attributes.background: I started my career as a police officer in Luton. Having worked the Luton Carnival I can speak first hand of the fear of knowing the gang members (usually from London) significantly outnumbered police officers. Since the cuts this has got worse and the public and officers are unnecessarily at risk!

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the Luton carnival.

You could raise this issue with local councillors in Luton. You can use this page to find out how to contact local councillors:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

Luton Council also has a petitions process:

https://www.luton.gov.uk/Council_government_and_democracy/Local-democracy/Pages/Petitions.aspx

Local policing issues are the responsibility of elected Police and Crime Commissioners. You could contact the local PCC about this:

http://www.bedfordshire.pcc.police.uk/Home.aspx
